articles.title: Some Android 15 phones will be forced to shoot in Ultra HDR by default - Android Authority
articles.description: Google is requiring that some phones running Android 15 will have to take photos in Ultra HDR using the main rear and front-facing cameras.
articles.content:
• Devices that declare they meet performance class 15 will be required to support Ultra HDR for the main rear and front-facing cameras.
